name: ROS Noetic (catkin) - erl_quadrotor_vicon
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'source /opt/ros/noetic/setup.bash && mkdir -p /workspace/catkin_ws/src && for p in $(find /workspaces/erl_quadrotor_vicon -maxdepth 2 -name package.xml -printf "%h\n"); do ln -sfn "$p" /workspace/catkin_ws/src/$(basename "$p"); done && cd /workspace/catkin_ws && catkin build'
